00031

00033         //void GetRunName(void){return fRunName;}
00034         //void GetFileName(void){return fFileName;}

00061         void SetSambaMinorVersionNum(Int_t aWord) {fSambaMinorVersionNum = aWord;}
00062 
00063         //calculated quantities
00064         Int_t GetRunYear(void) const {return GetRunName().compare(0,1,"a") + 2000;}
00065         Int_t GetRunMonth(void) const {return GetRunName().compare(1,1,"a") + 1;}
00066         Int_t GetRunDay(void) const {return atoi(GetRunName().substr(2,2).c_str());}
00067         
00068

00072         Int_t fNtpDateMicroSec;
00073         Int_t fSambaDAQNumber; //this is found in the name.. a=1, b=2, c=3, etc..
00074                 
00075         Int_t fRunNameSize;

00077         Int_t fFileNameSize;
00078         Char_t *fFileName; //[fFileNameSize] ka26b004_000, for example
00079         Int_t fPosition;
00080         Double_t fDelai; //time since last event on this mac, or on this bolometer... ??
